description: Fundación Alimentaris, established in Argentina in 2012, aims to enhance economic, social, and environmental initiatives through evidence-based methodologies. The foundation focuses on food as a fundamental right, promoting community well-being and sustainable practices. With three thematic areas—Community, Environment, and Prosperity—Alimentaris acts as a catalyst for change, fostering collaborative projects that strengthen community ties and improve living conditions. Their work emphasizes a systemic approach to address complex challenges in food systems and community development.
name: Fundación Alimentaris
